data.actual_result: Keyboard overlaps so you are not able to reach it .
data.expected_result: Photo selection menu would come up.
data.short_description: The keyboard overlaps the picture selection menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Open server list and press + - Select create a server - Once you clicked **create a server** , after do not touch anything - Wait about 2 secs and your keyboard will come up - After your keyboard comes click the server icon to upload an image to your server - Observe that keyboard overlaps photo selection menu
